address: an external URL like the one your router uses (localhost or IPs starting with 192 will not work for things like GitLab or Twitter)
port: a TCP port number like 9000 (you may need to configure your ISP's router settings)
pfx: required if useSSL is true and you don't have both key and cert files
key: required if useSSL is true and you don't have a pfx
cert: required if useSSL is true and you don't have a pfx
useSSL: true if you want sent/received webhook data to be secure over HTTPS; else webhooks will use HTTP
